trans-unit.source: You can use [Copy Power]{1} to copy more powerful abilities. In addition to the normal options for using Effort with [Copy Power]{2}, if you apply one level of Effort, the GM chooses a mid-tier ability that most closely resembles that power (instead of a low-tier ability).
trans-unit.target: You can use [Copy Power]{1} to copy more powerful abilities. In addition to the normal options for using Effort with [Copy Power]{2}, if you apply one level of Effort, the GM chooses a mid-tier ability that most closely resembles that power (instead of a low-tier ability).

trans-unit.source: When you use Improved Copying, a copied ability must be low, medium, or high tier according to how it is listed in the ability categories. It doesn’t matter if a type or focus makes it available at a lower or higher tier.
trans-unit.target: When you use Improved Copying, a copied ability must be low, medium, or high tier according to how it is listed in the ability categories. It doesn’t matter if a type or focus makes it available at a lower or higher tier.
